outline:
1. to hurl, cast
    1. (Pilpel) to throw away, carry away, hurl
    2. (Hiphil) to throw, cast, cast out
    3. (Hophal)
      1. to be hurled, hurled down
      2. to be cast, be thrown, be cast out, be thrown down
kjv_def: carry away, (utterly) cast (down, forth, out), send out.
strongs_def: to pitch over or reel; hence (transitively) to cast down or out
